mapper.insert:
insert into vehi_illicit (id, vehiNo, vehiNoType, nature, ownership, owner, adress, mgrDepart, mgrDepartAreaId, vehicle_id, illicitTime, illicitScore, illicitAmount, illicitAdress, illicit, illicitDesc, pickDepartment, pickDepartmentDesc, state, remark, version, isDeleted, createTime, updateTime, deleteTime, createBy, createDepCd, updateBy, updateDepCd) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vehino,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vehinotype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ownership,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mgrdepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mgrdepartareaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.illicittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.illicitscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.illicitamount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.illicitadress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.illicit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.illicitdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pickdepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pickdepartmentdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isdeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdepcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updatedepcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select to_days(now()) - to_days(vdi.illicitTime) AS days FROM ${vehiDrIllicit} vdi join (select id FROM ${vehiDrIllicit} where vehiState ="001" AND vehiNo =#{vehiNo} AND vehiNoType=#{vehiNoType} AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 36 MONTH) <= illicitTime)tmp ON tmp.id =vdi.id

select COUNT(1) FROM ${vehiDrIllicit} vdi join (select id FROM ${vehiDrIllicit} where vehiNo =#{vehiNo} AND vehiNoType=#{vehiNoType} AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 36 MONTH) <= illicitTime)tmp ON tmp.id =vdi.id
